import React from 'react' const InfoAuthModal = ({ authInfoModal, createAuthInfoModal }) => { const styleObj = { position: 'absolute', top: '-12%', left: '50%', transform: 'translateX(-50%)', with: '100%', padding: '6px', background: authInfoModal.type === 'Error' ? 'red' : 'green', fontSize: '16px', color: '#fff', whiteSpace: 'nowrap', } console.log(authInfoModal) return
{authInfoModal.text}
} export default InfoAuthModal
